long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Affirmations can sometimes feel hard to accept, and other times they're hard to think of. A gentle reminder is an interactive chrome extension that appears when you open a new tab. Tired? Stressed? Unhappy with yourself? Once you open the new tab you'll find an envelope. Click open the letter and there will be a little reminder or affirmation to comfort you during looping or anxiety-producing thoughts as you work or study. Practice slowing down and being gentle with yourself. A little progress and a little practice goes a long way.
